item.title: Linux - SystemD
item.description: SystemD systemctl - the one stop shop for all service / system related tasks systemctl [status|start|stop|reload|restart|...] <unit-name> Basic service control systemctl enable <unit-name> Symlinks a unit to start on boot systemctl list-unit --type=[service|...] Get a list of installed units systemctl daemon-reload Reload units from disk. Requires root
